snippet: American authorities have discovered models of a new drug-ferrying submarine capable of traveling, unseen from the surface, from Ecuador to Los Angeles.
abstract: Submarines are the new challenge facing the United States and Latin American countries as narcotics organizations bankroll machine shops to build diesel-powered vessels that would be the envy of all but a few nations; American authorities have discovered at least three models of a new and sophisticated drug-trafficking submarine capable of traveling completely underwater from South America to the coast of the United States.

byline.original: By MICHAEL S. SCHMIDT and THOM SHANKER

lead_paragraph: American authorities have discovered models of a new drug-ferrying submarine capable of traveling, unseen from the surface, from Ecuador to Los Angeles.

headline.seo: Drug Smugglers Pose Underwater Challenge in Caribbean
headline.main: To Smuggle More Drugs, Traffickers Go Under the Sea
headline.print_headline: Smugglers Go Under the Sea To Move Drugs
